meanings.definition: A lever used for controlling the movement of a cursor or a video game character.
meanings.sent1: The joysticks on the controller helped me navigate through the game easily.
meanings.sent2: I moved the character on the screen using the joysticks.
meanings.sent3: The joysticks were like magic wands, guiding my character through the virtual world.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the joysticks, directing the cursor with precision.
meanings.sent5: With the joysticks in hand, I felt like a skilled pilot maneuvering through obstacles.

meanings.definition: A device consisting of a stick that pivots on a base and is used for controlling the movement of a cursor or a video game character.
meanings.sent1: He adjusted the sensitivity of the joysticks to improve his gaming experience.
meanings.sent2: The joysticks were responsive and made the gameplay more enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: The joysticks seemed to have a mind of their own, leading the character in unexpected directions.
meanings.sent4: As she mastered the joysticks, her control over the game became unparalleled.
meanings.sent5: The joysticks became an extension of my hands, seamlessly guiding the character through challenges.
